dcterms:creator: Luca Bertinetto
João F Henriques
Philip HS Torr
Andrea Vedaldi
dcterms:description: CIFAR-FS consists of 32 × 32 color images from the CIFAR-100 dataset, split into 64, 16, and 20 classes for meta-training, meta-validation, and meta-testing, with 600 images per class.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-FS

dcterms:creator: Oriol Vinyals
Charles Blundell
Timothy Lillicrap
Koray Kavukcuoglu
Daan Wierstra
dcterms:description: MiniImageNet is a common few-shot benchmark consisting of 84 × 84 color images, with 100 classes of 600 examples each. Similar to CIFAR-FS, it uses 64 classes for meta-training, 16 for validation, and 20 for meta-testing.
dcterms:title: MiniImageNet
